com.petgame.ui

Class ParentalControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.petgame.ui.ParentalControl

  • public class ParentalControl
extends java.lang.Object
    The ParentalControl class provides functionality for controlling and tracking playtime. It supports enabling or disabling restrictions, setting allowed time windows, and keeping statistics on playtime sessions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParentalControl()
      Constructs a ParentalControl object with default settings (disabled, full day allowed).
